institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 9 (selection of business group and confirmation of business plan)
contents: Article 9 (Selection of business group and confirmation of business plan) ① The Chairman selects a business group and finalizes the business plan after deliberation and resolution by the Deliberation Committee. ② After completion of deliberation by the Deliberation Committee, the Chairman of the Board must notify the relevant business group of the selection and enter into a training agreement in writing. ③ A separate agreement shall be reached between the association/organization and the joint training center, or between the joint training center and the contracting company, according to mutual agreement. must be concluded.
